description: a(1) = 1, a(2) = 2, a(3) = 3; and for n > 3, a(n) = smallest number > a(n-1) and not of the form a(i)*a(j)*a(k) for 1 <= i < j < k < n.
links: Charles R Greathouse IV, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
prog: (PARI) list(lim)=my(v=List(),n,d,k); while(n++<=lim, d=divisors(n); for(i=1,#d-2, if(!setsearch(v,d[i]), next); for(j=i+1,#d-1, if(!setsearch(v,d[j]), next); k=n/(d[i]*d[j]); if(d[j]>=k, break); if(denominator(k)==1 && setsearch(v,k), next(3)))); listput(v,n)); Vec(v) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Sep 16 2015
author: _Clark Kimberling_
extensions: More terms from _Christian G. Bower_, Nov 15 1999.
